column1: original court within such time and in the form and manner hereinafter
The notice of appeal shall be presented to the court of first instance
for  this  purpose,  by  the  party  appellant  or  his  registered  attorney
within  a  period  of  fourteen  days  from  the  date  when  the  decree  or
order appealed against was pronounced, exclusive of the day of that
date  itself  and  of  the  day  when  the  petition  is  presented  and  of
Sundays and public holidays, and the court to which the notice is so
presented shall receive it and deal with it as hereinafter provided. If
such conditions are not fulfilled, the court shall refuse to receive it.‚Äù
